EmailTemplate.subject: Make the simple possible – visit NCR at NGA booth #1219
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’re excited for the upcoming 2022 NGA Show in Las Vegas, where the food retail community comes together for unique learning and networking. NGA is “where grocers look to the future,” and the NCR Retail team is sharing ways to make that future simple, so you can focus on your business. Visit us at booth #1219 and find out how we’re helping industry leaders like you do just that. We look forward to seeing you there!
